file_content.text: Surviving the Okara Factory shows guts, I'll give you that.
We need to strike at the Imperials again--soon. You better be with us.
You better watch yourself. Your reputation isn't going to save you.
Chemish says you're doing pretty good. Maybe you can live up to your reputation.
We're going to use those power cores you got us... make the Imperials afraid.
You may not be Balmorran, but you're alright.
Every time we attack the Imperials, the governor takes his revenge on the civilians in Sobrik. It's disgusting.
By killing Darth Jadus, the Eagle showed that not even the Dark Council is safe.
Chemish doesn't trust you, and I sure don't trust you either.
We're Balmorrans fighting for our home. Who do you think you are?
Gray Star will hear about you. Don't worry about that.
What are you looking at me for?
